```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plm)
library(doBy)

panel <- read.csv("Country_year_panel.csv", header=TRUE)
```

```{r}

plot(panel$temp, panel$l_yield)
abline(lm(panel$l_yield~panel$temp), lwd=3, col="blue")
lines(lowess(panel$temp, panel$l_yield, f=.1, iter=0), lwd=3, col="red")

```
